entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
